resources.name: Wood
resources.description: Collected from fallen trees. Used for fuel and crafting charcoal.

resources.name: Charcoal
resources.description: Nearly pure carbon, it is made by heating wood in the absence of air, evaporating water and volatiles.

resources.name: Spruce Resin
resources.description: A viscous sap that can be collected by cutting the bark of a spruce tree.

resources.name: Spruce Glue
resources.description: I have no idea, I guess an adhesive made of charcoal and spruce resin

recipes.name: Make Charcoal
procedure: Cover with soil leaving small air vents.
Light from bottom and allow slow burn.
Seal vents once smoke turns blue.

recipes.name: Make Spruce Glue
procedure: Melt resin in clay or metal vessel
Remove impurities with straining cloth or by hand
Mix in finely powdered charcoal to improve gap filling
